title: முஸ்லீம் என்பதால் உத்தரப் பிரதேச சிறுவனுக்கு சிகிச்சை மறுக்கப்பட்டதா?
author: tamil.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Shahjahanpur: Woman carried body of 9-yr-old son to home in her lap allegedly after District hospital didn't provide her free-of-cost hearse. Emergency Medical Officer says, "they said they want to get him treated somewhere else & left. He died on the way. We weren't approached" pic.twitter.com/QNyx92nIg3
